sentences.en: Of course she had a perfect right to suit herself about the kind of a man she took for a husband, but he certainly had not thought she was such an utter coquette.
sentences.cn: 当然，她完全有权利拒绝自己不喜欢的男人，但他完全没想到她之前居然是在卖弄风情。

sentences.en: She's a bit of a coquette.

words.tran_cn: 妖艳的；卖弄风情的；迷人的

trans.tran_en: a woman who frequently tries to attract the attention of men without having sincere feelings for them
